data.email_message: {"header"=>"Dragon Rage", "section1"=>"imagine you are writing an email. you are in front of the computer. you are operating the computer, clicking a mouse and typing on a keyboard, but the message will be sent to a human over the internet. so you are working before the computer, but with a human behind the computer.", "button"=>"Count me in!"}
data.sms_message: Bring Drinks to the Picnic this Saturday

email_message.section1: imagine you are writing an email. you are in front of the computer. you are operating the computer, clicking a mouse and typing on a keyboard, but the message will be sent to a human over the internet. so you are working before the computer, but with a human behind the computer.

message_params.sms_message: Bring Drinks to the Picnic this Saturday
